channel.title: Make it so that when a player is PKed they drop cash...?
channel.description:
How would i go about making it so that when a player was Pked they would drop a certain amount of cash, 995? I'm using a 317 server.
Sorry if I don't understand what you're talking about, if you answer... please try to answer with some detail. I wont understand if you don't explain it at all. It doesn't have to have HUGE detail, since i'm not 100% new... but just some so that i could kind of understand it. I have good common sense, so i think I'll understand.
THANK YOU! :D

item.title: Make it so that when a player is PKed they drop cash...?
item.dc:creator: @PushedPrawn PushedPrawn
item.description:
@PushedPrawn wrote:

Swiftymcfeat:

Prbably the easiest way you be to give the player the cash just before the drop item method. This may cause dupes but its easy. Another way would be just to make it create the item on the ground but im not sure how to make it show for just one person, it would be global.

How would i make the cash appear in the pkers inventory?

Read full topic
item.source: Make it so that when a player is PKed they drop cash...?
